t: Amazon.com: Epicurious Cookware Collection- Dishwasher Safe Oven Safe, Nonstick Aluminum 2 Piece Copper Fry Pan Set: Home & Kitchen
s: This brand was recommended to me by a coworker. I did not want to buy the full set because I've been fooled before by pots claiming to be easy to clean. I've even bought some from infomercials but this brand and set takes the case. I was impressed by the look and weight.
